title: xkcd-styled chart for R
code: library(xkcd) library(dplyr) df <- gapminder::gapminder |>   filter(country %in% c("United States", "United Kingdom", "Canada", "Australia"))

title: xkcd-styled chart for R
code: df |>   x_chart(title = "my xkcd line graph") |>   x_line(x = "year", y = "lifeExp", color = "country") |>   x_options(legend_position = 4)

text: specific chart types, either one x_line, x_point, x_bar, x_pie x_radar needs appended x_chart

title: Initialize — init
code: x_chart(data, title = NULL, ..., width = NULL, height = NULL, elementId = NULL)

title: Initialize — init
text: data data frame title chart title ... configuration options, see x_options

title: Line Graph — x_line
text: x: x variable y: y variable color: optional group variable mapped colors

title: Scatterplot — x_point
code: x_point(w, x, y, fill = NULL, size = 1)

title: Common configuration options — xkcd-options
text: various functions controlling guide elements title, axis label, legend, fonts

title: Common configuration options — xkcd-options
code: x_options(   w,   title = NULL,   xlabel = NULL,   ylabel = NULL,   palette = NULL,   font_family = "xkcd",   stroke = "black",   background = "white",   legend = true,   legend_position = 1,   ... )  x_label(w, title = NULL, xlabel = NULL, ylabel = NULL)  x_title(w, title = NULL)  x_legend(w, legend = TRUE, legend_position = 1)

title: Common configuration options — xkcd-options
text: w: xkcd widget object title: title xlabel: title x axis ylabel: title y axis palette: color palette different groups font_family: font family stroke: color axis, title legend box background: background color legend: legend shown legend_position: integer controlling legend position, 1 (left), 2 (right), 3 (left), 4 (right)

title: Shiny bindings for xkcd — xkcd-shiny
text: Output render functions using xkcd within Shiny applications interactive Rmd documents.

title: Shiny bindings for xkcd — xkcd-shiny
code: xkcdOutput(outputId, width = "100%", height = "400px")  renderXkcd(expr, env = parent.frame(), quoted = FALSE)

title: Shiny bindings for xkcd — xkcd-shiny
text: outputId output variable read width, height Must valid CSS unit (like '100%', '400px', 'auto') number, coerced string 'px' appended. expr expression generates xkcd env environment evaluate expr. quoted expr quoted expression (quote())? useful want save expression variable.
